00001 #script to optimize the crystal structure of (NH2)2CO (urea)
00002 from sample.Sample import Sample
00003 from molDynamics.gulp.TwoAtomPotential import TwoAtomPotential
00004 from molDynamics.gulp.ThreeAtomPotential import ThreeAtomPotential
00005 from molDynamics.gulp.FourAtomPotential import FourAtomPotential    
00006 from applications.MdApp import MdApp
00007 #from MdApp import MdApp
00008 import danseGlob
00009 from os import sep
00010 # set up the sample with atoms, periodicity, atomic interactions
00011 sample = Sample()  
00012 sample.i.unitCell = '''[[5.550830, 0.0, 0.0], [0.0, 5.550830, 0.0], 
00013 [0.0, 0.0, 4.695612]]'''
00014 sample.i.atoms = '''[['C', 0.00000000, 0.50000000, 0.32600000], 
00015 ['C', 0.49999920, 0.00000000, 0.61502595], 
00016 ['O', 0.00000000, 0.49999998, 0.58816619], 
00017 ['O', 0.50000040, -0.00000039, 0.35285659], 
00018 ['N', 0.14293176, 0.64293184, 0.18101006], 
00019 ['N', 0.85706814, 0.35706821, 0.18101006], 
00020 ['N', 0.64293288, 0.85706713, 0.76001372], 
00021 ['N', 0.35706811, 0.14293188, 0.76001345], 
00022 ['H', 0.26167656, 0.76167659, 0.27731462], 
00023 ['H', 0.73832344, 0.23832347, 0.27731458], 
00024 ['H', 0.76167757, 0.73832243, 0.66370978], 
00025 ['H', 0.23832195, 0.26167805, 0.66370971], 
00026 ['H', 0.13785881, 0.63785890, 0.96043229], 
00027 ['H', 0.86214114, 0.36214121, 0.96043228], 
00028 ['H', 0.63785790, 0.86214210, -0.01940859], 
00029 ['H', 0.36214109, 0.13785891, -0.01940832]]'''
00030 
00031 sample.i.partialCharges = "{'C':0.380000, 'O':-0.380000, 'N':-0.830000, 'H':0.415000}"
00032 sample.i.initialTemp = 300.0
00033 
00034 CAndOBond = TwoAtomPotential('C', 'O')
00035 CAndOBond.assignInteraction('morseGulpEx10')
00036 CAndOBond.i.interIntra = 'intra'
00037 
00038 CAndNBond = TwoAtomPotential('C', 'N')
00039 CAndNBond.assignInteraction('morseGulpEx10')
00040 CAndNBond.i.interIntra = 'intra'
00041 
00042 HAndNBond = TwoAtomPotential('H', 'N')
00043 HAndNBond.assignInteraction('morseGulpEx10')
00044 HAndNBond.i.interIntra = 'intra'
00045 
00046 CAndO = TwoAtomPotential('C', 'O')
00047 CAndO.assignInteraction('lennardGulpEx10')
00048 CAndO.i.interIntra = 'inter'
00049 
00050 CAndN = TwoAtomPotential('C', 'N')
00051 CAndN.assignInteraction('lennardGulpEx10')
00052 CAndN.i.interIntra = 'inter'
00053 
00054 OAndO = TwoAtomPotential('O', 'O')
00055 OAndO.assignInteraction('lennardGulpEx10')
00056 OAndO.i.interIntra = 'inter'
00057 
00058 NAndO = TwoAtomPotential('N', 'O')
00059 NAndO.assignInteraction('lennardGulpEx10')
00060 NAndO.i.interIntra = 'inter'
00061 
00062 NAndN = TwoAtomPotential('N', 'N')
00063 NAndN.assignInteraction('lennardGulpEx10')
00064 NAndN.i.interIntra = 'inter'
00065 
00066 CAndC = TwoAtomPotential('C', 'C')
00067 CAndC.assignInteraction('lennardGulpEx10')  
00068 CAndC.i.interIntra = 'inter'      
00069 
00070 NAndCAndO = ThreeAtomPotential('N', 'C', 'O')
00071 NAndCAndO.assignInteraction('threeBodyGulpEx10')    
00072  
00073 HAndNAndC = ThreeAtomPotential('H', 'N', 'C')
00074 HAndNAndC.assignInteraction('threeBodyGulpEx10') 
00075  
00076 HAndNAndH = ThreeAtomPotential('H', 'N', 'H')
00077 HAndNAndH.assignInteraction('threeBodyGulpEx10') 
00078                
00079 NAndCAndN = ThreeAtomPotential('N', 'C', 'N')
00080 NAndCAndN.assignInteraction('threeBodyGulpEx10') 
00081                
00082 OAndCAndNAndH = FourAtomPotential('O', 'C', 'N', 'H')
00083 OAndCAndNAndH.assignInteraction('torsionGulpEx10') 
00084                
00085 NAndCAndNAndH = FourAtomPotential('N', 'C', 'N', 'H')
00086 NAndCAndNAndH.assignInteraction('torsionGulpEx10') 
00087                
00088 OAndCAndNAndN = FourAtomPotential('O', 'C', 'N', 'N')
00089 OAndCAndNAndN.assignInteraction('torsionGulpEx10') 
00090                        
00091 forcefields = [CAndOBond, CAndNBond, HAndNBond, CAndO, CAndN, OAndO, NAndO, NAndN, 
00092              CAndC, NAndCAndO, HAndNAndC, HAndNAndH, NAndCAndN, OAndCAndNAndH, 
00093              NAndCAndNAndH, OAndCAndNAndN]
00094 sample.i.forcefields = forcefields
00095     
00096 # invoke the application and set its inventory
00097 app = MdApp()
00098 print app.inventory.propertyNames()

00106 g = app.i.mdEngine
00107 g.i.sample = sample
00108 g.i.runType = 'optimize'
00109 g.i.coordinateFormat = 'fractional'
00110 g.i.optimizeCoordinates = True
00111 g.i.optimizeCell = True
00112 g.i.constantPressureOptimize = True
00113 g.i.dispersionInRecipSpace = True
00114 g.i.computeMaterialProperties = True
00115 g.i.executablePath = danseGlob.installDir+sep+'gulp/gulp3.0/practice/gulp'
00116 g.i.inputDeck = 'ureaOpt.gin'
00117 g.i.trajectoryFilename = 'ureaOpt.xyz'
00118 g.i.logFilename = 'ureaOpt.log'
00119 app.run()
